name: Smart Copy

screenshots.caption: SC executing an XML script for the Windows command line

short_description: Smart Copy is a single-file Python app for batch execution (Ant-like) of commands. For example, SC can dump a SQL database, zip it and a source dir, and then send everything to an FTP site. Batch files are XML-based. See More >> Wiki for full details.
